reference.title: The World Time Pro window
reference.shortdesc: This topic describes the buttons and fields in the World Time Pro window.

image.alt: This graphic shows the fields and buttons in the main World Time Pro window. The window has a main calculation pane, a Fraction Creator pane and a Fraction Converter pane.
This graphic shows the fields and buttons in the main World Time Pro window. The window has a main calculation pane, a Fraction Creator pane and a Fraction Converter pane.

property.propdesc: Contains the buttons and fields to perform addition, subtraction, multiplication and division of units of time.
Specifies the first period of time in the calculation.
Specifies the second period of time in the calculation. If you click the Multiply or Divide buttons, the lower row of entry fields are replaced by the Constant field.
Display the result of the calculation.
Specifies if the calculation is addition (+), subtraction (-), multiplication (x) or division (/).
Deletes all values from the pane.
Moves the value in the result fields to the upper row of entry fields.
Contains the buttons and fields to convert fractions into periods of time.

Specifies the fraction to be converted into a period of time.
You specify if the fraction is in hours or minutes by selecting either Hrs or Min below this field.
In the Fraction Converter pane, converts a fraction into a period of time.
In the Fraction Creator pane, converts a period of time into a fraction.
Contains the buttons and fields to convert periods of time into fractions.
Displays the period of time as a fraction of hours, minutes or seconds. You specify if the fraction is in hours, minutes or seconds by selecting either Hrs, Min or Sec below this field.
